centralQuestion: Was Trump’s One Big Beautiful Bill Act (OBBBA) economically a good idea?

reasons.description: Permanent full expensing for equipment and R&D, along with making many 2017 TCJA provisions permanent, is projected to boost long‑run GDP by 0.7 – 1 % and give firms policy certainty that encourages new investment. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
